mapper.update: UPDATE doctor_work_plan_schedule p JOIN medical_registration r ON r.doctor_schedule_id = p.id SET p.num = p.num - 1 WHERE r.out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS workPlanId, s.id AS scheduleId, s.slot AS slot, s.maximum AS maximum, s.num AS num FROM doctor_work_plan p JOIN doctor_work_plan_schedule s ON p.id = s.work_plan_id WHERE p.date = STR_TO_DATE('${date}', '%Y-%m-%d') AND p.doctor_id = #{doctorId} ORDER BY s.id
